Subsection.Text: A secured party’s acceptance of collateral in full or partial satisfaction of the obligation it secures:

Paragraph.Text: Discharges the obligation to the extent consented to by the debtor;
Transfers to the secured party all of a debtor’s rights in the collateral;
Discharges the security interest or agricultural lien that is the subject of the debtor’s consent and any subordinate security interest or other subordinate lien; and

Subsection.Text: A subordinate interest is discharged or terminated under subsection (1), even if the secured party fails to comply with this chapter.
